entries.name: Earth Elemental

traits.name: Stonefist
traits.effect: Heavy blow that rattles bones and focus.

entries.description: A living mass of rock and soil animated by the Plane of Earth.

entries.name: Bound Earth Elemental

traits.name: Geas of Stone
traits.effect: Compelled service makes it resist displacement.

traits.name: Wardstone Core
traits.effect: Briefly hardens to shrug off a strong hit.

entries.description: A conjured earth spirit shackled to a caster’s sigils.

entries.name: Unbound Earth Elemental

traits.name: Quake Surge
traits.effect: A rumbling shock that unsettles formation.

entries.description: Freed of any sigil, it follows only tectonic instinct.

entries.name: Earth Revenant

traits.name: Bedrock Body
traits.effect: Massive frame shrugs off staggering blows.

entries.description: A hardened echo of ancient stone will.

entries.name: Earth Ascendant
entries.description: A paragon of the Earth Plane, will layered like strata.

entries.name: Earth Spirit

traits.name: Dust Veil
traits.effect: Shrouds allies in grit that softens blows.

traits.name: Burrowglide
traits.effect: Moves through soil with little resistance.

entries.description: A gentler geomancy that steadies allies.

entries.name: Fire Elemental
entries.description: A hungry blaze given will from the Plane of Fire.

entries.name: Bound Fire Elemental

traits.name: Cinder Ward
traits.effect: Briefly sheathes allies in embered protection.

entries.description: A contained inferno leashed by a caster’s glyph.

entries.name: Unbound Fire Elemental
entries.description: A free-roving inferno that answers only to fuel and wind.

entries.name: Fire Revenant

traits.name: Coalheart
traits.effect: Core embers rekindle after a harsh blow.

entries.description: Persistent embers of a mighty pyre’s malice.

entries.name: Fire Ascendant

traits.name: Inferno Crown
traits.effect: A corona of sovereign flame ravages foes.

entries.description: A monarchal conflagration; a furnace made flesh.

entries.name: Fire Spirit

traits.name: Warming Light
traits.effect: Kindles courage and mends small wounds.

traits.name: Emberstep
traits.effect: Skips like sparks, hard to pin down.

entries.description: A benevolent flicker that emboldens allies.

entries.name: Air Elemental

traits.name: Gust Slash
traits.effect: Razor wind that startles and pushes focus astray.

traits.name: Vortex Form
traits.effect: Loose blows pass through its whirling body.

entries.description: A whorl of living gale from the Plane of Air.

entries.name: Bound Air Elemental

traits.name: Anchor Sigil
traits.effect: Runes keep the current steady and controllable.

entries.description: Harnessed wind that holds to a conjurer’s anchor.

entries.name: Unbound Air Elemental

traits.name: Tempest Whorl
traits.effect: A sudden squall that confuses ranks.

entries.description: Storm-quick and whimsical, answerable to no rune.

entries.name: Storm Revenant

traits.name: Thunder Mark
traits.effect: Booming crack unnerves the marked foe.

entries.description: The lingering spite of a broken stormfront.

entries.name: Tempest Ascendant

traits.name: Eye of the Gale
traits.effect: Calms allies while battering enemies with edgewinds.

traits.name: Lightning Crown
traits.effect: Arcs of charge sap momentum from blows.

entries.description: A sovereign storm given will and purpose.

entries.name: Zephyr Spirit
entries.description: A gentle wind-soul that cools heated tempers.

entries.name: Water Elemental

traits.name: Tide Lash
traits.effect: A chilling surge that dulls aggression.

entries.description: A living tide called from the Plane of Water.

entries.name: Bound Water Elemental

traits.name: Anchor Shell
traits.effect: Condenses into a firm barrier when ordered.

entries.description: A disciplined wave held to a summoner’s call.

entries.name: Unbound Water Elemental
entries.description: A flood spirit that follows the whims of depth and storm.

entries.name: Tide Revenant

traits.name: Drownheart
traits.effect: Cold pressure saps a foe’s resolve.

entries.description: Salt-soaked memory of a relentless sea.

entries.name: Sea Ascendant

traits.name: King Tide
traits.effect: A sovereign surge that washes foes aside.

entries.description: The sea’s authority given form and voice.

entries.name: River Spirit
entries.description: A cheerful stream-soul that favors gentle guidance.

entries.name: Lasher
entries.description: Animated flora that guards sacred groves.

entries.name: Treant

traits.name: Barksmash
traits.effect: Hefty limb strike that numbs arms.

entries.description: Ancient tree-wardens who stir only when needed.

entries.name: Spriggan Sapling

traits.name: Quick Sprout
traits.effect: Recovers slightly when bathed in light.

entries.description: Mischievous sprouts that flit between roots and stones.

entries.name: Ancient of the Grove

traits.name: Verdant Call
traits.effect: Rallies lesser plants to hinder foes.

entries.description: A venerable forest spirit that embodies renewal.

entries.name: Light Elemental

traits.name: Radiant Lance
traits.effect: A beam that sears shadow and doubt.

traits.name: Aureole
traits.effect: Halo softens harm to nearby allies.

entries.description: A coherent flare of the Holy Light given purpose.

entries.name: Light Revenant

traits.name: Sanctify
traits.effect: Purifies a foe’s malice, weakening their next action.

entries.description: Lingering devotion crystallized into form.

entries.name: Arcane Elemental

traits.name: Mana Bolt
traits.effect: A precise shock that muddles concentration.

entries.description: Raw mana coalesced into a thinking lattice.

entries.name: Mana Revenant
entries.description: A spent ritual’s will that refuses to fade.

entries.name: Mana Wyrm

traits.name: Mana Siphon
traits.effect: Saps a user's mana pool, preventing casting for a turn.

traits.name: Mana Flush
traits.effect: Expels contained mana, increasing haste of all those nearby for a turn.

entries.description: A simple elemental creature of pure arcane energy.

entries.name: Shadow Elemental

traits.name: Void Grasp
traits.effect: Clutch of entropy that saps vigor.

entries.description: A knot of void energy coalesced into motion.

entries.name: Shadow Revenant

traits.name: Abyssal Husk
traits.effect: Light skitters off its surface, dulling blows.

entries.description: A remnant of darkness that clings where light fled.

entries.name: Void Ascendant

traits.name: Entropy Wave
traits.effect: A rolling surge that unravels resolve.

entries.description: A prince of emptiness whose will dims the world.
